description: Pointer to the fault status variable related to
this alarm.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmObject

description: Pointer to the fault status variable related to
this alarm.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmFaultStatus

description: The management name of the entity this alarm
pertains to.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmMgmtName

description: The value of this object identifies the physical
entity in the LUM-INVENTORY-MIB this alarm
pertains to.
Set to zero if not used.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmInvPhysIndexOrZero

description: The value of this object identifies the logical
entity in the LUM-INVENTORY-MIB this alarm
pertains to.
Set to zero if not used.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmInvLogicalIndexOrZero

description: The type of alarm as defined in ITU-T X.733.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmType

description: The probable cause of the alarm as defined in
ITU-T X.733.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmCause

description: The additional text for the alarm.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmText

description: The severity of the alarm as defined in
ITU-T X.733.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmSeverity

description: The time when the alarm was created.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmCreatedTime

description: The time when the alarm was last changed.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmLastChangeTime

description: The last sequence number used when issuing
a notification for this alarm.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmSeqNumber

description: The name of the alarming network element.
Contains the user configurable network
element name (system::node::0::neUserName)
if set, otherwise the host name
(system::node::0::name).
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmNeName

description: The IP address for the alarming network element.
variables.name: LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmNeIpAddress

description: Sent when an alarm with major severity is
raised.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmNotificationMajorV2 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmIndex u 9999 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmObject o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmFaultStatus o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmMgmtName s EXAMPLE LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmInvPhysIndexOrZero u 9999 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmInvLogicalIndexOrZero u 9999 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmType i 0 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmCause i 0 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmText s EXAMPLE LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmSeverity i 0 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmCreatedTime s EXAMPLEE LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmLastChangeTime s EXAMPLEE LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmSeqNumber c 9999 LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmNeName s EXAMPLE LUM-ALARM-MIB::alarmNeIpAddress a 192.0.2.1
